description: This file declares the WebSockets::JsonRpc::Response class, which inherits from a base Message class and provides methods to access response ID, result, error, and validity status in a JSON-RPC context.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: A class representing a JSON-RPC response message, providing access to response details such as ID, result, and error.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID associated with this response.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if the response contains a result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result object from the response.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the response contains an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error object from the response.
